title: Winter Is Coming | What we're planting now to eat in January

tasks.task: Planting winter vegetables in a greenhouse.
subtasks: Prepare seed trays for claytonia seeds.
Transplant claytonia plants into ground beds.
Plant winter carrots in caterpillar tunnels.
Provide frost covers for the crops during cold weather.
Plan crop planting strategically for seasonal changes.
Use low-cost greenhouses for winter cultivation.
Install east-west oriented greenhouses for better sunlight.
Cover crops with row covers for insulation.
Harvest vegetables during the winter using protected methods.
Encourage viewers to enroll in the gardening course for more tips.
Share relevant links in the video description for further resources.
